mapper.select: select a.id, a.rule_name as title, c.id as rel_id from onl_auth_data a left join onl_auth_relation c on c.auth_id = a.id where a.status = 1 and a.cgform_id = #{cgformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.type = 3

select a.id, a.code, a.page, a.control, b.db_field_txt as title from onl_auth_page a join onl_cgform_field b on a.code = b.db_field_name and b.cgform_head_id = #{cgformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a.status = 1 and a.type = 1 and a.cgform_id = #{cgformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id, a.code, a.page, a.control, b.BUTTON_NAME as title from onl_auth_page a left join onl_cgform_button b on a.code = b.BUTTON_CODE and b.CGFORM_HEAD_ID = #{cgformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a.status = 1 and a.type = 2 and a.cgform_id = #{cgformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
